content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 1502021 the case has been ongoing and on june 16 2021 there was progress the first step was the cost procedure to determine the expenses involved then a judgment was made in the first instance but the details are not mentioned the case was then taken to the supreme court the highest court in the country again specific details are not provided finally there is mention of compensation being awarded the case involves a real estate plot referred to as plot xxx with ownership divided 60 for the plaintiff and 40 for the defendant the supreme court dismissed the application for revision meaning the lower courts decision stands the specific laws mentioned are the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court decision referred to is sklep vrhovnega sodišča rs ii dor 1502021 made on june 16 2021 the core conditions outlined in article 367 of the civil procedure act were met the defendant applied for leave to appeal the first instance courts judgment raising procedural irregularities the application was considered wellfounded and the supreme court will review the decision the court of second instance made a decision that goes against previous rulings of the supreme court questioning the uniform interpretation of the law the defendants application for review was dismissed for not meeting the necessary requirements the decision was unanimously adopted by the courts chamber

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 150/2021, 16. 6. 2021
